item.title: CEN2023 - Conference of the Central European Network
item.description:
Date Sep 3 – Sep 7, 2023
Event CEN2023 Conference - From Data to Knowledge. Advancing Life Sciences.
Location    Biozentrum of the University of Basel, Switzerland

As a member of the Early Career Working Group of the IBS-DR, I will co-organize the following sessions:

  • Young Statisticians Session, where young statisticians present their research in a friendly atmosphere with the possibility to get feedback on their presentation.

  • Panel discussion on “Should I stay or should I go? - Going abroad during your academic career”.

item.title: Young Statisticians Lecture Series - Modern Statistical Methods for Life Sciences
item.description:
The Young Statisticians Lecture Series is organized by the Early Career Working Group (AG Nachwuchs) of the IBS-DR. This online lecture series should give students of Statistics and Biometry the opportunity to present their Master’s thesis or current PhD project in a larger and more flexible time frame than is usual at conferences.

Past and future talks can be found here.

I mainly organize the event and also do the moderation from time to time.

item.title: Seminars in Biostatistics by the IBS-DR
item.description:
A seminar series organized by the German Region of the International Biometric Society (IBS-DR) on specialized lectures in the field of biometrics.

The event is planned by a committee of which I am a member.

item.title: DAGStat 2022 conference
item.description:
Date Mar 28 – Apr 1, 2022
Event DAGStat 2022 conference
Location    Universitätsklinikum Hamburg-Eppendorf

As a member of the Early Career Working Group of the IBS-DR, I co-organized the following sessions:

  • Young Statisticians Session, where statisticians at an early stage of their career present their research in a friendly atmosphere with the possibility to get feedback on their presentation.

  • Panel discussion on “Science vs. Industry – Career Options in (Bio-)statistics”. I co-chaired this event.

item.title: 67th Biometric Colloquium “Scenes from Biostatistics”
item.description:
Date Mar 14 – Mar 17 2021
Event Biometric Colloquium 2021 conference
Location    Institute of Biostatistics and Clinical Research of the Westfälische Wilhelms-Universität Münster (held as online event)

As a member of the Early Career Working Group of the IBS-DR, I co-organized the following sessions:

  • Young Statisticians Session, where statisticians at an early stage of their career present their research in a friendly atmosphere with the possibility to get feedback on their presentation.

  • Panel discussion on “Networking – Bessere Karrierechancen durch Netzwerken?”. I chaired this event.

item.title: GMDS & CEN-IBS 2020
item.description:
Date Sep 06 – Sep 09, 2020
Event GMDS & CEN-IBS 2020 conference
Location    Charité Berlin (held as online event)

As a member of the Early Career Working Group of the IBS-DR, I co-organized the following sessions:

  • Young Statisticians Session, where statisticians at an early stage of their career present their research in a friendly atmosphere with the possibility to get feedback on their presentation.

  • Panel discussion on “Traditional vs. new career paths in biostatistics”. I co-chaired this event.
